mapper.insert: insert into Patent( patent_name, pt_id, pr_id, ps_id, aod_id, application_number, application_time, public_number, public_time, authorization_number, authorization_time ) values( #{patent_name}, #{pt_id}, #{pr_id}, #{ps_id}, #{aod_id}, #{application_number}, #{application_time}, #{public_number}, #{public_time}, #{authorization_number}, #{authorization_time} )
